alert.note: Alert for Luzerne; Wyoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 4:59PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Luzerne and southwestern Wyoming Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 458 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near East Berwick, or near Berwick, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wilkes-Barre, Muhlenberg, Kingston, Berwick, Nanticoke, Plymouth, Exeter, Swoyersville, Edwardsville and Larksville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
